data.name: EDR/AMP - Security Operations Dashboard
data.description: Comprehensive EDR/AMP (Cisco Secure Endpoint) security monitoring dashboard for NOC operations. Provides real-time threat detection, endpoint health monitoring, MITRE ATT&CK mapping, and investigation capabilities.
